threats.title: Credential Theft
threats.description: Attackers could impersonate users if passwords are weak or leaked.

threats.title: Query Injection
threats.description: Malicious queries could manipulate search results or expose hidden records.
threats.mitigation: Use Prepared Statements and Input Validation

threats.title: Unauthorized Access
threats.description: Users might deny transactions or modify borrowing records.

threats.title: Privileges Escalation
threats.description: An attacker could gain admin rights and alter critical settings.

threats.title: Data Breach
threats.description: Sensitive user and book data could be exposed if improperly secured.

threats.title: Data Breach
threats.description: Sensitive user and book data could be exposed if improperly secured.

threats.title: Data Breach
threats.description: Sensitive user and book data could be exposed if improperly secured.

threats.title: Log Deletion
threats.description: Attackers could erase logs to cover their tracks.
